name: 希特勒奏鸣曲
summary: This short movie from Sokurov uses archival footage of Adolf Hitler composed in a new manner with sometimes classical, sometimes unsettling music in the background. I'm not sure about the date of the production, as the final cut was made in 1989 but the preliminary version was ready in 1979 with so many early films by Sokurov, this film has two dates: the first is the date of i...
